channel.title: Presentation on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Presentation on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: #AstriCon 2011: Building a Distributed Call Centre
item.description: The presentation and configuration files from my presentation at AstriCon 2011 today is available at: http://leifmadsen.com/sites/default/files/AstriCon 2011 - Building a distributed call centre.zip

item.title: AstriCon presentation today at 11:40am
item.description: I’ll be speaking at AstriCon today (and tomorrow) about building a distributed call centre. The presentation will be 35 minutes long and will contain a set of slides that moves you from an existing traditional PBX system up through a distributed model (which happens to use a call centre as the example system). A PDF of the presentation along with the configuration files from the demo will be available on my website after the presentation.
